CaptureControllerSetFocusBehavior.summary: The interface's setFocusBehavior() method controls whether the captured tab or window will be focused when an associated {{jsxref("Promise")}} fulfills, or whether the focus will remain with the tab containing the capturing app.

remarks.para: You can set this behavior multiple times before the call, or once immediately after its Promise resolves. After that, the focus behavior is said to be finalized, and can't be changed.
